document_data.name: Melf's Minute Meteors
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Melf's minute meteors''''' was a [[fire]]-based [[evocation]] spell.

To [[Zakhara]]n mages, always reluctant to acknowledge [[ajami]] names and accomplishments, the spell was known simply as '''''minute meteors''''', and counted among the spells of the [[Flame (province)|province of flame]].
document_data.Effects:
The spell created six tiny meteors that orbited the caster for up to 10 minutes, until released upon a target or until the caster stopped concentrating. When released, the meteors exploded on impact.

The effects of ''Melf's minute meteors'' could also be achieved by accident through the misuse of [[opal]]s as components of magical items that evoked both fire and lightning.
document_data.Components: The spell needed [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[Verbal component|verbal]] components, as well as niter, sulfur and a bead of pine tar for materials.
document_data.History: ''Melf's minute meteors'' was a rare spell in the [[1360]]s [[DR]] in both [[Faerûn]] and Zakhara.{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Notable Uses:
[[File:Minute meteors DC Comics.jpg|thumb|left|''Minute meteors fired, yet somehow still missing, at point-blank range.'']]
During the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]], the [[Shar|false avatar]] of [[Selûne]] hurled ''minute meteors'' at [[Kyriani]] in the kitchen of [[Castle Waterdeep]], but she was able to dodge them.{{Cite comic/Dark of the Moon|16}}
